APP.TITLE: Sample project for linking Angular & Spring Boot in Docker
APP.EXPLAINATION_1: The project only serves to represent the function between Spring Boot & Angular in Docker.
APP.EXPLAINATION_2: So it doesn't look particularly nice, but it does the job.
APP.EXPLAINATION_3: In the title bar you will find access to the blog article, the GitHub repository and a way to change the language.
